kiripindu danaya sahitha perahara aluyama 5.30 ta, aluyama 6.30 sita 7.30 dakwa uposatha ashtanga silaya samadan karawima, keti anushasanawa saha maithri bhawanawa sidu kirima dharmayathanadhipathi himi, perawaru 7.30 sita 8.00 dakwa danaya prathyawekshawa haputhale nyanawisuddhi himi, 8.30 sita 9.30 dakwa bhawanawa nimalgoda saddhawihari himi, 9.30 sita 10.30 dakwa gihi deshanaya bi.aasiri rajapaksha mahathma 10.30 sita 10.45 bhawanawa wandurambaa nyanaloka himi, 10.45 sita paswaru 12.00 dakwa dahawala sambuddha pujawa sidukirima dampahala nyanasudhira himi, paswaru 12.30 sita pa.wa. 2.00 dakwa dharma sakachchawa pannipitiye niyandagala jathika saradharma prawardhana madhyasthanaye pradhani aacharya pi‡∑ärathi kulathunga mahathma 2.00 sita 3.00 dakwa jathaka katha deshanawa shasthrapathi nimal amarawansha mahathma, 3.00 sita 4.00 dakwa kawyamaya dharma deshanawa hanguranketha nyaninda podihamuduruwan wahanse, 4.00 sita paswaru 5.00 dakwa maha pirith deshanawa sahitha maha samaya suthra deshanawa dharmayathanaye himiwaru, 6.30 ta sil pawaranaya sidu kirima ha ashtapana sahitha samma sambuddha gilanpasa bodhi pujawa sidu kirima, dharmayathanadhipathi na himi, 8.00 budusarana pathra bedadima, ke.di. chamila menawiya mathara.thalawathugoda walipara sanghamiththaramayehi pohoya dina aluyama 5.30 ta wisheshayen sakasu kshirapayasa atawisi buddha pujawak saha asumaha shrawika pujawak pawathwanu labana athara perawaru 6.00 sita paswaru 6.00 dakwa sila, bhawana, dharmadeshana wadasatahan pawathwe.

enamuth kri.wa. 12 wani siyawasa pamana hindu dharmaya , bodu dahama abhibawa rajya anugrahaya yatathe prachalithawu bawin buddhagayawada ‚Äúmahantha‚Äù namathi hindu pujaka parapuraka palanayata yatathwa , maha wiharaya asala hindu dewolada thana (danudu atha) maha wiharaye buddha prathimawa idiripasa shiwa lingayakda thanpath kara buddhagaya wiharaya hindu puda bimak bawata path kara ganna ladi.shrimath edwin aarnald thuma (1832 - 1904) indiyawata pamina awurudu 12 k , (1848 - 1860) dakwa punawe rajya widyalaye widuhalpathi lesa katayuthu kalaha.ema kalaya thula ohu sanskrutha bhashawa gana hasala danumak labagena pasuwa engalanthaye ‚Äòdeli teligrap puwathpathe karthru thanathura laba nawatha engalanthayata yana ladi.aarnold thuma engalanthayedi 1861 , indiyanu sanskrutha granthayak wu hithopadeshaya (rajekuta thibiya yuthu danuma) ingi‡∑ärasiyatama pariwarthanaya kara prasiddha karana ladi.ikbithiwa shasanalankara kawidhaja winayacharya waligama shri sumangala nahimiyan (1825 - 1905) 1878 di hithopadeshaya sinhalayata pariwarthanaya kara prasiddha karana ladi.unwahanse aarnold thuma ingi‡∑ärasiyen rachitha aasiyawe aalokaya gana athimahath sathutata pathwa thama rachitha sinhala pitapatha sahithawa sanskrutha kawipelakda samanga lipiyak aarnold thuma wetha yawana ladi.ema lipiyata prathichara dakwu aarnold ingi‡∑ärasi basin 1881 mayi masa 30 wani dina pilithurak ewamin thama saha ee himiyan athara sama abhilashayak athi bawda thamata shri lankawe bauddha thathwaya ganada danwa ewana lesada danwiya.me anuwa kulupaga mithrathwayak dedena athara sidu wu athara lipi huwamaruwakda sidu karini.shrimath aarnold indiyawata nawatha pamina madurasiye sita 1886 janawari masa 23 wani dina shri sumangala na himiyanta thama saranath buddhagayawa ha anikuth bodu bim, daka balagath bawath, thama shri lankawata paminena dinaya pasuwa danwana bawath lipiyakin danwana ladi.pasuwa ethuma shri lankawata sapathwa kolambaa galumuwadora hotalaye sita 1886 janawari 30 wani dina unwahanseta lipiyak yawamin thama panadurayata sanduda perawaru 8.46 ta lagawena dumriyen ehi paminena baw danwana ladi.waligama shri sumangala himipano yuhusuluwa panadura nagaraye athi rankoth wihara dharma shalawe shrimath edwin aarnold thuma piliganimata uthsawayak sudanam kalaha.ema uthsawayata ewakata wisi dewani wiye wu anagarika dharmapalathumatada aaradhanaya karana ladi.gihi jiwithaye don dewid hewa witharana nam wu ethuma mathara hiththatiye janma labhaya lath kolambaa thama wyaparaya pawathwa gena giya hewawitharana don karolisthumage ha mallika wijayagunarathna mathiniyage puthraya lesa upatha labuha.
